events.message: The insured reported an accident involving their vehicle colliding with a street pole on April 30th at approximately 7 PM.
After reviewing initial claim details, this case was categorized under 'Auto Accident' due to the vehicle collision described.
An insurance claims agent was assigned to manage and oversee the process of this vehicle collision claim.
Acknowledgement sent to the policyholder confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining next steps.
Requested photos of vehicle damage, police report, and a statement from the insured regarding the circumstances of the collision.
The insured submitted all requested documentation including detailed photos, police report, and personal statement within the deadline.
Claims investigator began assessing the submitted evidence and planned to verify the extent of the vehicle damages and responsibility.
Investigation concluded confirming the cause of the accident as documented and assessing damages covered under policy terms.
A settlement amount for repair and medical expenses was proposed and communicated to the insured for review.
The insured responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the claim handling process to date.
Formal approval of the claim was granted, authorizing payout based on the agreed settlement figures.
Payment was successfully issued to the insured via bank transfer to cover all approved costs related to the vehicle accident.
The claim was officially closed after payment confirmation and final administrative review.
All case documents and claim details were archived securely in compliance with company retention policies.
